page.title: 15SYMINGTON CHURCH TODAY
page.content: The Rev.A.S.Sutherland has been the Minister of Symington Norman Church for sixteen years. A service is held every Sunday from 10.30am to 11.30am.About 100 people come to church on a Sunday morning.The church is much the same as it was in olden times .As you go in the Church if you look at the ceiling you will see that there are oak beams showing.On either side of you are pews with green cushions on them.If you walk right down you will come to three steps and on your right hand side is a pulpit.If you look up and to your left you will see the balcony where the organ plays but there are pews there as well.Symington Church is a popular place for weddings.In the last year there have been many christenings and thankfully few funerals.There are a total of 10 stained glass windows.
